00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00030 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00031 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/form_maker/simbio_form_table_AJAX.inc.php';
00032 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/paging/simbio_paging_ajax.inc.php';
00033 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/datagrid/simbio_dbgrid.inc.php';
00034 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/simbio_dbop.inc.php';
00035 
00036 // privileges checking
00037 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('master_file', 'r');
00038 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('master_file', 'w');
00039 
00040 if (!$can_read) {
00041     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to access this area!').'</div>');
00042 }
00043 
00044 /* RECORD OPERATION */
00045 if (isset($_POST['saveData']) AND $can_read AND $can_write) {
00046     $placeName = trim(strip_tags($_POST['placeName']));
00047     // check form validity
00048     if (empty($placeName)) {
00049         utility::jsAlert(__('Place Name can\'t be empty')); //mfc
00050         exit();
00051     } else {
00052         $data['place_name'] = $dbs->escape_string($placeName);
00053         $data['input_date'] = date('Y-m-d');
00054         $data['last_update'] = date('Y-m-d');
00055 
00056         // create sql op object
00057         $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00058         if (isset($_POST['updateRecordID'])) {
00059             /* UPDATE RECORD MODE */
00060             // remove input date
00061             unset($data['input_date']);
00062             // filter update record ID
00063             $updateRecordID = (integer)$_POST['updateRecordID'];
00064             // update the data
00065             $update = $sql_op->update('mst_place', $data, 'place_id='.$updateRecordID);
00066             if ($update) {
00067                 utility::jsAlert(__('Place Data Successfully Updated'));
00068                 echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', parent.getPreviousAJAXurl(), \'post\');</script>';
00069             } else { utility::jsAlert(__('Place Data FAILED to Updated. Please Contact System Administrator')."\nDEBUG : ".$sql_op->error); }
00070             exit();
00071         } else {
00072             /* INSERT RECORD MODE */
00073             // insert the data
00074             $insert = $sql_op->insert('mst_place', $data);
00075             if ($insert) {
00076                 utility::jsAlert(__('New Place Data Successfully Saved'));
00077                 echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00078             } else { utility::jsAlert(__('Place Data FAILED to Save. Please Contact System Administrator')."\nDEBUG : ".$sql_op->error); }
00079             exit();
00080         }
00081     }
00082     exit();
00083 } else if (isset($_POST['itemID']) AND !empty($_POST['itemID']) AND isset($_POST['itemAction'])) {
00084     if (!($can_read AND $can_write)) {
00085         die();
00086     }
00087     /* DATA DELETION PROCESS */
00088     $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00089     $failed_array = array();
00090     $error_num = 0;
00091     if (!is_array($_POST['itemID'])) {
00092         // make an array
00093         $_POST['itemID'] = array((integer)$_POST['itemID']);
00094     }
00095     // loop array
00096     foreach ($_POST['itemID'] as $itemID) {
00097         $itemID = (integer)$itemID;
00098         if (!$sql_op->delete('mst_place', 'place_id='.$itemID)) {
00099             $error_num++;
00100         }
00101     }
00102 
00103     // error alerting
00104     if ($error_num == 0) {
00105         utility::jsAlert(__('All Data Successfully Deleted'));
00106         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_POST['lastQueryStr'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00107     } else {
00108         utility::jsAlert(__('Some or All Data NOT deleted successfully!\nPlease contact system administrator'));
00109         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_POST['lastQueryStr'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00110     }
00111     exit();
00112 }
00113 /* RECORD OPERATION END */

00116 ?>
00117 <fieldset class="menuBox">
00118 <div class="menuBoxInner masterFileIcon">
00119     <?php echo strtoupper(__('Place')); ?> - <a href="#" onclick="setContent('mainContent', '<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>master_file/place.php?action=detail', 'post');" class="headerText2"><?php echo __('Add New Place'); ?></a>
00120     &nbsp; <a href="#" onclick="setContent('mainContent', '<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>master_file/place.php', 'get');" class="headerText2"><?php echo __('Place List'); ?></a>

00123     <input type="text" name="keywords" size="30" />
00124     <input type="button" id="doSearch" onclick="setContent('mainContent', '<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>master_file/place.php?' + $('search').serialize(), 'post')" value="<?php echo __('Search'); ?>" class="button" />
00125     </form>

00129 /* search form end */
00130 /* main content */
00131 if (isset($_POST['detail']) OR (isset($_GET['action']) AND $_GET['action'] == 'detail')) {
00132     if (!($can_read AND $can_write)) {
00133         die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to access this area!').'</div>');
00134     }
00135     /* RECORD FORM */
00136     $itemID = (integer)isset($_POST['itemID'])?$_POST['itemID']:0;
00137     $rec_q = $dbs->query('SELECT * FROM mst_place WHERE place_id='.$itemID);
00138     $rec_d = $rec_q->fetch_assoc();
00139 
00140     // create new instance
00141     $form = new simbio_form_table_AJAX('mainForm', $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_SERVER['QUERY_STRING'], 'post');
00142     $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="saveData" value="'.__('Save').'" class="button"';
00143 
00144     // form table attributes
00145     $form->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00146     $form->table_header_attr = 'class="alterCell" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00147     $form->table_content_attr = 'class="alterCell2"';
00148 
00149     // edit mode flag set
00150     if ($rec_q->num_rows > 0) {
00151         $form->edit_mode = true;
00152         // record ID for delete process
00153         $form->record_id = $itemID;
00154         // form record title
00155         $form->record_title = $rec_d['place_name'];
00156         // submit button attribute
00157         $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="saveData" value="'.__('Update').'" class="button"';
00158     }
00159 
00160     /* Form Element(s) */
00161     // place name
00162     $form->addTextField('text', 'placeName', __('Place Name').'*', $rec_d['place_name'], 'style="width: 60%;"');
00163 
00164     // edit mode messagge
00165     if ($form->edit_mode) {
00166         echo '<div class="infoBox">'.__('You are going to edit place data').' : <b>'.$rec_d['place_name'].'</b>  <br />'.__('Last Update').$rec_d['last_update'].'</div>'; //mfc
00167     }
00168     // print out the form object
00169     echo $form->printOut();
00170 } else {
00171     /* PLACE LIST */
00172     // table spec
00173     $table_spec = 'mst_place AS pl';
00174 
00175     // create datagrid
00176     $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00177     if ($can_read AND $can_write) {
00178         $datagrid->setSQLColumn('pl.place_id',
00179             'pl.place_name AS \''.__('Place Name').'\'',
00180             'pl.last_update AS \''.__('Last Update').'\'');
00181     } else {
00182         $datagrid->setSQLColumn('pl.place_name AS \''.__('Place Name').'\'',
00183             'pl.last_update AS \''.__('Last Update').'\'');
00184     }
00185     $datagrid->setSQLorder('place_name ASC');
00186 
00187     // is there any search
00188     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00189        $keywords = $dbs->escape_string($_GET['keywords']);
00190        $datagrid->setSQLCriteria("pl.place_name LIKE '%$keywords%'");
00191     }
00192 
00193     // set table and table header attributes
00194     $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00195     $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00196     // set delete proccess URL
00197     $datagrid->chbox_form_URL = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00198 
00199     // put the result into variable
00200     $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 20, ($can_read AND $can_write));
00201     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00202         $msg = str_replace('{result->num_rows}', $datagrid->num_rows, __('Found <strong>{result->num_rows}</strong> from your keywords')); //mfc
00203         echo '<div class="infoBox">'.$msg.' : "'.$_GET['keywords'].'"</div>';
00204     }
00205 
00206     echo $datagrid_result;
00207 }
00208 /* main content end */
00209 ?>
